title: (x) Summer carnival fonts - various {gang}
content:
Hey guys - i'm searching for some fonts for a website - we're looking for some coney island/carnival/fair/summer fun type fonts - like we're using them to make logos for the events this summer and putting corny slogans with them such as "guaranteed fresh" and "test your strength" those type of things - so if any body has any good suggestions for "carny" type fonts please let me know - thanks guys   
   
and the "free-er" the better lol   
thanks again   
tom
author: dangerboy

comments.content:
check out this website---may not have free stuff but it's a must see IMO!   
   
 [http://www.goldenstudios.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131145627/http:/www.goldenstudios.com/)

I was reminded of Letterhead Fonts yesterday by a post on another thread in this forum, and I think it's appropriate here, too. Take a look at [Strong Calliope](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131145627/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/contributors/briankniceley/strongcaliope.shtml) or a number of other things there. Pretty darn inexpensive and quite delicious-looking. I may have to visit there before I do my summer party this year.

There's actually a free font (Fontalicious) called 'Coney Island' that might be useful:   
   
 [http://www.fontalicious.com/super/fonts.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131145627/http:/www.fontalicious.com/super/fonts.html)

almost forgot-after my query about this font on another board here is a freebie fer ya...   
   
 [http://www.bry-backmanor.org/circusfont.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131145627/http:/www.bry-backmanor.org/circusfont.html)
